author: m.kalinin
content: According to this design, light client users are getting secured by the committee randomly sampled from validator registry which drastically increases light client security. What benefits do light clients get from fraud and data availability proofs then? If beacon or a shard block is partially available or invalid then it should not gain 2/3 of the votes of light client committee.

author: .vbuterin
content: They would get the ability to detect a 51% attack that tries to feed invalid blocks
